title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Haaram with Pearl Drops - Traditional Elegance
materials: pave-set diamonds with VS clarity and round brilliant cut. Two central emeralds (4.14 carats total weight) add a regal touch. Adorned with nine lustrous South Sea pearls (19.80 carats total weight).
features: This haaram seamlessly blends traditional floral motifs with a modern design. The intricately crafted gold framework showcases delicate diamond settings. Two prominent floral pendants, each centered with a vibrant emerald, create a focal point. Dainty pearl drops add a touch of traditional charm. The chain is designed with a geometric and floral motif, with diamonds accenting the links.
colors: Primarily a yellow gold color scheme with the sparkle of white diamonds. The lush green emeralds and creamy white pearls provide a beautiful contrast and balance.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for festive occasions like Diwali and Ugadi
and for adding a touch of South Indian heritage to modern events.
description: This haaram is a stunning blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern jewelry design. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds are sure to catch the eye, while the pearl drops add a touch of classic elegance. It is a unique statement piece, perfect for the discerning woman who appreciates fine craftsmanship and cultural heritage. It's an investment piece that will become a treasured heirloom, passed down through generations.
